dependencies.ajv: This package dropped support for older node versions and requires the ajv package to be recompiled. Use v6.X.Y for Node v4.
dependencies.@grpc/proto-loader: v0.3.0 - This package is used for GRPC connection, supports node v6 and above.
dependencies.commander: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use v2.X.Y for Node v4.
dependencies.google-auth-library: This package is used for GRPC connection, supports node v10 and above, but fromJSON function works in node v8.11.1 - should use v6.1.X only

kafka-node.comments: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use v2.X.Y for Node v4.

dependencies.underscore: This package sohuld be pinned to 1.13.1 in package-lock.json due https://npmjs.com/advisories/1674.

dependencies.long: This package is used for GRPC connection, this can only be used with node v8.11.1 and higher (http2 support).
dependencies.prom-client: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use v11.X.Y for Node v4.
dependencies.uuid: This package dropped support for older node versions starting v7.0.0. Their policy is supported node versions + one legacy version.

devDependencies.chai: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use v4.X.Y for Node v4.
devDependencies.grpc-mock: This package is used for GRPC connection, dependent of grpc lib that supports node v4 and above.
devDependencies.grpc: This package is used for GRPC connection. Pinned to v1.24.7 as later versions do not compile on Node v6.
devDependencies.mocha: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use v5.X.Y for Node v4 and v6.2.2 for Node v6.
devDependencies.nock: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use v10.0.0 for Node v4.
devDependencies.nyc: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use v14.X.Y for Node v4.
devDependencies.sinon: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use v7.X.Y for Node v4.
devDependencies.winston: This package dropped support for older node versions. Use v2.X.Y for Node v4.
